content.detailedDescription: Date is approximate-don't remember exact date.  my former fiance and i were leaving our home on his motorcycle and headed west toward i-71. as soon as we turned onto the main road we noticed three painfully bright lights in the distance in a triangular formation, hovering not that far above the ground. at first we thought that they were attached to a crane, but as we drove closer we realized that they were a bit too high up for that. my ex was in the air force and knew his aircraft, but he kept saying "what the hell is that??" as we came closer to it we could see the huge silhouette behind the lights. it was about the size of a football field, like a huge rectangular slab lying horizontally a few hundred feet above the parking lot of an abandoned rink's department store. as we drove past it we could see smaller colored lights on the bottom of it. it had various geometric shapes in relief all over the exterior and was gunmetal gray. it was perfectly silent. when we drove to the "back" of the craft we noticed maybe 4-5 huge rectangular "windows" that were angled slightly down and were lit from within. it seemed like there were figures moving behind the windows. i was very scared and begged him to drive away, but he wanted to drive toward it. as we argued a group of african american teens (5-7 ages 13-17) ran across the road right in front of us and we slammed on our brakes. the teens were looking at the craft. they ran onto the parking lot and were nearly under it when it shot straight up into the sky and disappeared without a sound. if any of those formally young men are reading this, i hope that they will post what they saw.
content.summary: Observed football feild sized rectanguar craft with windows hovering over old rink's parking lot. multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down ireland road and the orb appeared to the right heading towards the notheast it was about 550ft to a mile away while making impossible aerial maneuvers right angle turns incredible acceleration etc.
content.summary: I was driving down ireland road and the orb appeared to the right heading towards the notheast

content.detailedDescription: Standing on back deck on phone with mother, had just witnessed 3 planes going over house from west to east, was just commenting to my mother about the planes when i saw a large white light coming from the west slowly moving towards me over the house heading east, it seemed to hover directly over me, then slowly kept heading east, but there was absolutely no sound, just dead silence.  i told my mother that it was odd not to see any other lights, green or red as is on a plane, just a solid, brilliant white light. i quickly got off the phone with my mother and i ran into the foyer to call out to my sons, and tried to grab a camera, but i did not have one charged and ready to go, so i ran back outside with my son.  it seemed to be in the same position it was when i went inside, and continued to head east. it slowly moved away from us, then started to go into the tree line, where it hovered in tree line for at least 1-1 1/2 minutes, and then it disappeared.  it did have an affect on me, i felt that this was no object that i could account for, such as a plane or helicopter.  the complete silence was confounding, and i was gripped with an emotion i have never felt.  it was somewhere between fear, disbelief, and awe.  i also felt very energized.  i am sending more video that i was about to report to you from earlier today.  note:  the attached videos are not what i just witnessed this evening.  one was from 4:00 a.M., april 7, 2012.  this object seemed to respond in its appearance after i flashed it with my led flashlight, and changed direction.  it was originally heading from east to west, but then changed direction and headed south after it "glowed intensely" until it disappeared.  i did not change the focus or any other settings, as you can see the stars remain the same before, during and after the orb glowed brightly. the second video i captured today, april 11, 2012, contained two white orbs.  although i began filming what i thought was just one orb heading from north to south, about 30 something seconds into taping with my bresser night vision 5 x 50 scope connected to my dvr, i spotted the second orb.  both orbs/lights seemed to be flying at the same rate of speed, although one appeared slightly higher than the other one. unfortunately, i cannot send all the videos to you as i am only permitted to upload 3 at a time, as i have many more.  i wrote to your web director who told me to submit them via this method, but it would take too long.  i am hoping there is another method in sending them to you.  thank you, and i am very upset that i did not have the ability to record the one that we saw this evening.  the third is just another orb filmed this morning, i have more of these.
content.summary: Standing on back deck on phone with mother, saw a large white light coming from the west slowly moving towards me over the house heading east, hovered in tree line, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Going to my car after work at about 20:05 pm (cst)3 red glowing objects were moving across the sky south to north they were very high, but lower than a plane would fly. they were glowing red a bit fuzzy around the edges and pulsating, in the center of each was a white light. two of the objects disappeared, one kept flying north until it went higher and disappeared.  i was looking for someone else near me, but no one was around and i did not have a camera.
i noticed it because they were very distinct and i'd never seen anything like them before.
i was a bit stunned and in disbelief, i could not readily explain what i had seen it was a very clear night.  i've been thinking a lot about it, i wanted to report it, but didn't know who to report it to!
content.summary: Going to my car after work 3 red glowing objects were moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at my grandma`s house at la brecha, a small town where a lot of agricultorists and fishers live.. then my cousin invited me to go take a walk, which we do regularly when we are in la brecha. we walked a few streets and got to the main street. there, we found another cousin and his friend. his friend took his bike and departed. we were talking about the beach and the hot weather, etc. i looked to the sky and saw a moving light. at first, i thought it was a plane or a helicopter plane, but then i saw it descended and then going up again ina very rare way. it surprised me because it happened very fast. i told both of my cousins and they looked up. my cousin then followed his friend and went home. we moved to another street to observe it better and then we walked toward it until we could see it better. we talked about calling history channel and bringing them down here, still kind of not believing what we were seeing. i had seen a lot of ufo videos and always wanted to see one, but i doubted. all my doubts flew away when we saw  it disappear, then we looked around to relocate it and found it moved about 120 degrees in a very short time. i was not scared but amazed. i asked my cousin if she had a cellphone or a camera to record it or take pictures but she did not. we kept walking and as we moved we could see it better. it looked exactly as a flying saucer. the light illuminated a little the shape of teh top of the object. we headed back home and i think we saw another one or two objects similar to the previous, but fastly disappeared. we got home and told our family what we saw. some of them believed us and went outside to see if they could see it or take pictures, but it wasn`t there anymore.
content.summary: Walking with my cousin on the streets and then observed the object. i thought first it was a plane, but it started moving rarely and with an irregular path, then saw it on different parts of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Hello. over the years my husband and i have often star gazed with our binoculars.  for 28 years we have watched, but lately here near by our land we are seeing more and more frequently lights in the sky that will appear to be stars, then they get brighter and taking off after sitting there for quiet some time. tthey are getting , bigger, bolder and more gather together at one time. i am really concerned what they are and doing. this happens almost every night. . i dont get any bad or good feeling, they seem to be playful. but i am alarmed because we  have lived there over 30 years and have never seen so many  so often. what can they be?// thank you.
content.summary: This is more  frequent than before, , they are more in numbers also

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter were outside in our garden, i was playing with my new mobile phone and my daughter pointed at something in the sky, it looked like a ufo so i quickly pointed the phones camera at the object, sadly i did not know how to zoom in. this is 100% authentic, footage only ends suddenly as the battery died.
content.summary: Real ufo, worlds best authentic footage

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after leaving my home for an early morning jog, i came across a very unusual object that hovered silently over a residential area and projected a bright white beam.  the object was rectangular in shape and nearly all black on the surface.  there were no colors or distinct markings.  i stopped jogging for a moment, although i had only run less than ��� mile (i run marathons), to observe the object while it remained in place for what seemed to be several minutes.  i felt the need to continue with my jog, and simultaneously the object began to move away as well. an eerie feeling must have come over me because my thoughts have been distorted since that day.  but i feel an obligation to report what i saw, and so i have done my best to recreate the picture in my mind.  attached is a drawing that depicts this moment to the best of my recollection.
content.summary: A clear view of a large rectangular vehicle hovering with bright spotlight.

content.detailedDescription: White light moves from one end of the sky to the other, moving in a consistent slowish arch, never fading, and then disappears about 200 ft before the horizon leaving only a faint small red light
content.summary: White light moves from one end of the sky to other, moving in consistent arch, never fading,disappears before the horizon leaving faint small red light

content.detailedDescription: About a month ago my 10 year old son and his brother woke me up by screaming for me to come to there bedroom,i checked on them and they told me they saw a bright blue light blind them inside the room,and when they got up and looked out the window they saw a small disk type object flying away from our home,my son said it was about the size of a yard stick. i told them at the time they must have seen an emergency vehicle going down the street and insisted that they just go to bed. on the 9th of this month we were all up late hanging out,my wife and i heard a noise coming from that bedroom,thinking it might be a ghost,because we live in a 102 yr old funeral home,we grab our ipod touches and digital voice recorder and open the door,not turning the light on. we enter the room and stay to the right wall of the room and stay standing in one position with my video recording in front of my face. we are talking out loud thinking that we may have a ghost in the home,and after a few minutes we leave the room. upon reviewing the recording that night we first hear as i enter the room my self what i can only describe as frogs croaking,mixed with an insect clicking language speech sound. it is loud but we did not hear it with our ears at the time. the video shows some sort of being what we first thought was a ghost of a kid or midget. we then see what appears to be a disk enter the room and hover above the white being and it zips left and right and then down on top of the main figure. we also notice at this time there seems to be a cloud or white energy ring being formed around the being,it seems to us that there are other beings in the room behind this one that has large almond eyes,typical larger head with small chin. then we notice when we frame by frame the video the disk zips up and left of me at an angle and this time we see it as a bright led neon plasma blue color as the beings are "sucked into it or are just leaving with it"? we still don't know for sure what we see but we for sure have this speech recorded and it is loud and very clear. we have no clue as to if we are really seeing this or not,were hoping its just our imagination because this is very frighting and too close to home we know the video on the ipod isnt perfect but we thought we were just going to document toys being moved by what we thought may have been a spirit in our sons room. the speech is what really has me convinced it is alien in nature i would gladly post the audio of this to anyone that wants to hear it. we are weeks away from having a baby and dont know if they are here for that reason or that they were doing something that has nothing to do with us at all,but my sons story a month prior now seems more believable to us all now,were all 6 sleeping in one bedroom together now and are moving out as soon as we can.
content.summary: In bedoroom we recorded a small disk hovering and decending near the floor

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1985, a friend and i were sitting on our bikes in the middle of the neighborhood street. we were facing north. it was night time, so there was no traffic and everyone was in for the night. we both heard a subtle noise like an air leak or a subtle swishing sound. for some reason, we both knew to look up. even though the noise was subtle, we could tell which way it was coming from. we saw a large triangle shape of dim lights about the size of maybe a football field. it was hard to tell the actual size because the object was being hidden by the stars. but it was close enough to to hear it. it was moving north west. it wasnt moving very fast. i remember being able to see right through it and see the stars. it was strange that the triangle shape of lights were visually the same size of the stars in the sky that we were seeing form our altitude. its as if the object had adjusted its light size in order to blend in with the size of the stars that we were seeing.
we ran inside frightened. we came out about 15 minutes later and never saw it again.
in 1993 or 94, i remember watching the larry king show that he aired from the desert near roswell. he had a bunch of ufo experts on the show. it just so happens that someone called into that show and described the exact thing that i had seen and heard but in a different part of the country about 8 years later. i was shocked.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, almost silent

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at a place with my brother and it just flew by on the sky.
content.summary: Just flew by

content.detailedDescription:
I observed an orb or oval-shaped object appear over trees located in a wooded area a mile and a half directly south of my house. i was in my garage, smoking a cigarette looking southward. the garage door was fully open and the garage lights were turned off. prior to the observed object, i had been shining a fairly powerful green laser pointer towards the exact same area that the object was observed. a few seconds after i stopped shining the laser in that direction, a solid red orb suddenly appeared over the tree tops. i was looking in the exact same direction as it appeared so i definitely saw nothing in the sky before it appeared. it did not appear to ascend from the ground, or at least it was not lit up prior to ascending above the tree tops. it remained above the tree tops as a solid red color for approximately ten seconds, then moved laterally about 100 feet, then instantly turned a solid green. it remained still, hovering above the tree tops for only 5-7 seconds in the solid color green, then instantly either very quickly flashed a bright white light on and off or even seemed to spin at a very high rate and then disappeared. it did not leave a vapor trail or any sort of trail as it did not appear to speed away from its hovering location. it simply disappeared as opposed to leaving at a very high velocity. the only thing i can offer to explain the nature of the light sequencing is that it simply turned them on then turned them off. also, at no point did i hear any noises coming from the object.
i was astounded at the very homogeneous nature of the red color it first appeared as. i knew right away that it could not have been an airplane, helicopter, blimp or other type of earthly aircraft that have alternating, flashing red and/or white marker lights. it could not have been some type of firework. i look up in the night sky all the time and i am aware of what i see (high and low flying aircraft, shooting stars, stars, planets, nebulae, the milky way galaxy, constellations, man made satellites in orbit around the earth, etc.). i was not able to identify this object as it did not behave as any of the previous objects would behave when observed. the fact that it was able to hover, stop completely, change colors and then disappear was very curious to me. also, the fact that i seemed to "induce" this event by shining my green laser pointer in the exact area that it appeared was somewhat troubling to me. did i "upset" the object and did it "retaliate" by showing itself to me? i don't know but i am 100% sure of what i saw and i have no explanation for it.
content.summary: Solid red, then solid green, then bright flash and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Aubrey crisp: we were looking at jupiter(bc it was really bright and amazingly visible), when we noticed something black- rectangular hovering over the tree line. it was completely silent, with 1 large light at what appeared to be the front of the craft and 6-8 smaller lights toword the back. it moved really, really slow, and sometimes appeared to be swaying. the lights blinked, pulsed and changed colors- red, yellow, white & green. it looked to be about the size of several football fields in length. as time passed, the craft seemed to slowly descend dropping further and further behind the tree line until it was no longer visible.We were completely blown away, and slightly nervous... we were watching "them", were "they" watching us? total sighting time: 30-45min.
content.summary: Black, silent, hovering with multi-colored "blinking/pulsing" lights and appeared to be swaying

content.detailedDescription:
We were in manuel antonio, costa rica on our hotel room balcony around 11:00pm at night on 2/13/2013. our hotel was set up on the side of a cliff overlooking the pacific ocean. we were sitting outside enjoying a beautiful night and looking at a very starry sky. we first noticed the object when what we thought was just one of the many stars we were looking at starting to move. it started to accelerate and move up at a great rate of speed, weaving in a cross motion. when i first saw the object i was unsure what it was, but after watching for a few seconds it was absolutely apparent that it was not an airplane or comet etc...My first thought is that it was a ufo.

the object was star like, very bright white light and round. it was very far away over the ocean but was still clear to our line of sight. we were very shocked when we saw the object, and my girlfriend was very scarred. the next day there was a magnitude 6.4 earthquake very close to manuel antonio. we lost sight of the object as it traveled up into the sky towards outer space (similar to a rocket launch) until it was no longer visible.
content.summary: We saw what we thought was a star in the night sky move at great speed in multiple directions in costa rica.

content.detailedDescription: Well..>>... i was sitting at home at the time when my girlfriend just came back from the store & said :-->> ""  hey honey grab your camara & you've gotta see this  "" so , as i did grab my camara & went out side my front door up in the sky looking due  north east i saw this very bright round looking  object in the sky & took my first still photograph picture of it but there was a tree in the way & so, i went onto my back patio too take the remainder of my 4 shots that i did take of this object, at the time it did'nt seem to be moving at all & its bright twinkling  light  that elluminated from it was really kool.  then i went inside my house too tell my buddy about it & my girlfriend too & by aprox. 4 to 5 mins & it was no longrer anywhere  too be seen.
content.summary: Very bright & twinkling round object    !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I just found this website but had i known of this site when this event happened, the exact date and time could have been clarified through cell phone history. so excuse me for the approx. date and time for it was over a year and a half ago.

in the early month of december of 2010 around 8:00-9:00pm, two of my friends and i were just finishing up a long day of work on his father's home remodeling. the weather forecast that night was predicting rain for the next morning, so it was important that we made sure to protect the exposed walls, surrounding materials, ect. from any excessive moisture expected from the downpour. so us three were tacking a vinyl construction tarp to the roof eave to prevent water entering through the exposed exterior wall. after we finishing wrapping things up, we all met at the tailgate of the pickup truck to discuss tomorrow's plan. this is when the sighting happened.

first i'd like to state the important description of that evening's night sky. yes rain was predicted for the following morning. however, the sky that night was extremely clear and i don't recall the moon being very prominent either(if the moon was even out that night). the location was just outside of the city which makes the night sky even more detailed as you all know. so that said, thousands of stars and star clusters littered the sky this night with not a rain cloud in sight yet.

so now back to the three of us discussing tomorrow's plan at the tailgate of the pickup...

as we all stood there looking at each other(not the sky), a very bright-lit object came into my peripheral vision which grabbed my instant attention. and not just mine, i recall all three of us turning our attention to this bright object at the same time. my other two friends recall the same exact scenario which makes it interesting because it describes the action and detail of how powerful this object really was. it had absolutely no blinking lights and the star bright "white" was unwavering(constant).

it appeared to perhaps, enter our atmosphere at a high rate of speed. it made a quick swooping-like angle of direction as if it were leveling out. the speed and star-like brightness was indescribable to anything man made! after it seemed to level out(if you will), it then seemed to slow down at a rate that was definitely not normal. with much enthusiasm in our voices, we shouted to each other things like, "what is that?!" "is it a plane!" "no way a plane can't slow down like that!" "a plane doesn't emit light like that!" "then what is it?!" stuff like that. (take into consideration that only about 15 seconds have passed now.) 

so this is when things got really weird, exciting, ect! next we heard what sounded to be like a helicopter or train(both of which have frequent routes close to this home). i said to my friends, "whatever that is it's not making that sound. that thing is way to high to be making that sound." that's when a helicopter appeared from the perimeter lying trees of the property. it flew directly over us at about only 1,500 feet(which was obviously the sound we heard). this gave the three of us our own personal gauge of just how high this object really was. think of the object as the size of an aspirin in your fingers holding it up to the sky with a helicopter flying over you. but far off in the distance of the large helo(i assume this object was easily above the 35,000 to 37,000 feet altitude in which passenger jets fly at). at this moment the object was moving very slow(it never stopped completely). after the helo passed and was gone...The slow moving "star" began to accelerate from it's sluggish stall. because of the tall trees i mentioned on the property that were only about 20 feet away from us, the object began to fly in a direction in which the trees were blocking it. 

i instantly began running out of the driveway to keep my eyes on this thing. meanwhile my friend jumped the fence and ran through the group of trees to the highway which was a totally different direction i took. me, running down the driveway in a panic i pulled my phone out of my pocket and just pressed send to call whoever the last person in my call history. it could've been anyone. my family friend answered to me yelling frantically "look in the sky, look in the sky!!!" i hung up and as i got to the end of the driveway the object was traveling at such a fast rate compared to that of a passenger jet we see in the sky! it again...Made a swooping-like angle of direction this time upwards as if it were leaving our atmosphere! during the quick change of direction it accelerated so fast that it just disappeared!!! i waited for a while before walking back to the truck hoping to see it again. when i got back to the pickup, all of us three could barely talk in turns...Let alone make sense of what we just saw. after about two hours we were able to take turns and describe the situation and all three of us witnessed the exact same thing. my buddy that ran to the highway said he too saw it fly "upwards before disappearing."

to this day i know that what i saw in the sky that night is something that no one can explain. i've been put down as if i were a whack job. things have been said to me like "oh you just saw a satellite." no i've seen satellites and as well as the space station! we all know satellites don't move with those variable rates of extreme travel, nor does the space station. i've also been told by a website i won't mention here that what i saw was a phenomenon called "ball lighting." well i know the theory behind ball lighting(now) and that theory for this detailed incident is just absurd!

i understand that many things are misidentified can be explained. but this here, i am one hundred percent sure that what i saw moved at speeds of which man cannot travel(not yet at least). this wasn't man made! it's important too that i mention that this occurred not too far from a military base. vandenberg air force base to be exact. although i am positive this wasn't military activity. far too advanced to be human. that six percent of truly unidentifiable flying objects...This is definitely in that six percent. my hope now is that someone else in my area recalls seeing this dominant object in the sky that night and shares their story as well. all three of us still to this day know we cannot be the only ones who witnessed this thing in the sky that night.
content.summary: 3 witnessed bright star-like object appear from high altitude with extreme velocity. rate of speed then dramatically slowed to near stop, then accelerating across sky before vanishing upward.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw two orange orbs stationary and then a third one was behind them lifting from the tree tops bigger and brighter than the other two. once it reached the same elevation as the others its orange glow became smaller untill it was the sames size as the other two and it started to move toward the others. when it caught up to the other two orbs all three started to move northwest slowly. i watched it as long as i could to see if they would make eratic movements but they just keept going till i couldnt see them due to the trees. they were silent and there was an air plane close to them traveling a differnt flight path as the orbs and they never converged in any matter with the plane but im sure the pilot saw them as well as highway traffic as they flew over interstate 4.
i did call the police department non emergency to report what i saw in case they recived other calls about the same thing "they said they would check on it" lol, eather way i needed to be responsable and report what i saw.It didnt last long enough for me to get media in time.
content.summary: Orange orbs

content.detailedDescription:
i was heading eastward on i-20 at 8:30 p.M. on thursday the 5th of april
 2012. i was passing thru longview texas just west of the eastman plant
 when i noticed an aircraft traveling from north to south passing over me.
 altitude was about 2000 feet i would estimate. i first noticed it by 
 the lights it carried, some solid and some blinking. nothing exceptional
 there. i happened to be just under it when it passed over, and was able
 to clearly see the outline of its body, what i called a chevron at the
 moment but others might call a boomerang. its flight was steady and
 straight, could not hear it as i was in vehicle. speed was not noteworthy,
 about what you would expect of jet aircraft. when i saw the shape of the
 vehicle i knew it was unconventional, and no it was not a stealth fighter
 or stealth bomber. i strongly feel this is probably u.S. hardware we 
 are not yet informed of  just like stealth technology a few years ago.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo over longview texas

content.detailedDescription: on 4/9/12 around 8:50pm at night i was in my backyard watering plants and and looked up in the sky and saw a bright object and was wondering what star it was,  and then all of a sudden it  started moving.  i called my wife outside as it was moving in a straight line and thought it was a satellite,  and as we were watching it move in a straight direction for about 1 minute it all of a sudden it disappeared.   i tried to record it on my iphone 4s but the video didn't come out very well, but i have included it anyway.
content.summary: Ufo in santa barbara, ca 4/9/12 8:50pm

content.detailedDescription: Well i was at a friends house when we went outside to hang out. i seen in the sky a bright orange "star" i thought. my friend said that it wasn't a star and we argued for a few minutes. all of a sudden it started flashing slowly dimming and lighting back up from orange to almost disappearing. it was also moving from left to right just hovering there. after about 20 minutes of doing this it dimmed and we never saw it again.
content.summary: Orange ufo sighting!

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my balcony facing north, saw object(s) in sky moving rapidly south to north at a fairly high rate of speed.  object(s) traveled straight-line paralleling rt. 159 through st. clair county.  object was dark and non-reflective.  no lights or sound.  i witnessed it only because the sky toward the horizon was lighter due to street lights and object was darker.  object appeared as three squares of unknown thickness configured as in the shape of a boomerang.  unable to determine elevation, but object was big enough or close enough that i could make out the three distinct sections.  object continued on until out of sight over a line of trees.
content.summary: Appeared as 3 squares together in the shape of a boomerang.

content.detailedDescription: I  was on my back uncovered patio looking for ufos.It was almost completely dark.I was watching venus start to set at 7:50 pm.I checked out about 3 airplanes with my 10x zeiss.I looked almost straight up and saw what looked like venus in size but moving toward north east straight line about speed of airplane,no sound.I got my binoculars on it still looked like single light like venus now moving away from me right through ursa major.I backed up away my house roof outline blocked my view.I ran through my house to the front yard and glassed it again as it moved out of sight.Sometimes it appeared to slow down and then speed up again but i can't say for sure.I'm thinking  maybe space station?It was a clear night and the event lasted 5 minutes or less.
content.summary: Object like venus straight up moving about airplane speed that may have been variable.I used zieiss 10x binoculars coming and going still just 1 light like venus

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this same object for the past several months but i have not reported it. it looks like a really bright star, but it is not a star. the object moves around and then comes back. it is a really bright silver un-like anything i have ever seen before. i think whatever it is, is following me to work and staying there until i leave. i have been taken by beings back in sept-2006. i have already filed a report with mufon. i do not feel afraid! i am just making a report so if they do attempt to take me again, this will be on record.
content.summary: The thing is following me to work

content.detailedDescription:
i know people will not believe me but i am being studied by tiny entities nightly, as soon as the lites go out in my bedroom. 

when this first happened, light translucent clouds started appearing hanging from ceiling in strands. i could blow at them and they would move. i could gently touch them and move them. the next week or so these sort of vine-like plants would grow around the room with thin leaves that were semi-transparent and fluttered. now, for the past 2 weeks i see little clusters of lights no more than a total outside dimension of 1". there are red, blue, green, white, etc.  after studying them each night i am sure they are intelligent.  the white dots slowly move around the room, mostly on the ceiling.  these seem to be following orders from the nests of colored dots as they blink quickly and then glow constantly until the next movement.  i can chase them with a flashlite and they don't like it.  one time one came as close as a foot from my face and studied me for about 30 seconds.  i kept calm and stared back smiling. it looked like a tiny 1/4" red flower (daisy-like shaped) with a cloudy aura around it about two inches wide.

i have not heard of any type of ufo that fits this description. i'm reluctant to even report this.  i will be in portland for 5 weeks beginning tomorrow.  i will try to take pictures of them when i get back if they are still here.  it will be interesting to see if they show up on a digital picture. 

has anyone ever reported anything like this to your organization?  the minuteness of them is quite different, almost molecular.  it was hard to fill out your sighting form because they don't fit.
content.summary: past 6 weeks, extremely tiny lights that blink, fly in dark room, intelligent, curious, communicate w/each other,t

content.detailedDescription:
i know people will not believe me but i am being studied by tiny entities nightly, as soon as the lites go out in my bedroom. 

when this first happened, light translucent clouds started appearing hanging from ceiling in strands. i could blow at them and they would move. i could gently touch them and move them. the next week or so these sort of vine-like plants would grow around the room with thin leaves that were semi-transparent and fluttered. now, for the past 2 weeks i see little clusters of lights no more than a total outside dimension of 1". there are red, blue, green, white, etc.  after studying them each night i am sure they are intelligent.  the white dots slowly move around the room, mostly on the ceiling.  these seem to be following orders from the nests of colored dots as they blink quickly and then glow constantly until the next movement.  i can chase them with a flashlite and they don't like it.  one time one came as close as a foot from my face and studied me for about 30 seconds.  i kept calm and stared back smiling. it looked like a tiny 1/4" red flower (daisy-like shaped) with a cloudy aura around it about two inches wide.

i have not heard of any type of ufo that fits this description. i'm reluctant to even report this.  i will be in portland for 5 weeks beginning tomorrow.  i will try to take pictures of them when i get back if they are still here.  it will be interesting to see if they show up on a digital picture. 

has anyone ever reported anything like this to your organization?  the minuteness of them is quite different, almost molecular.  it was hard to fill out your sighting form because they don't fit.
content.summary: past 6 weeks, extremely tiny lights that blink, fly in dark room, intelligent, curious, communicate w/each other,t

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch, smoking a cigarette, when i looked to the stars (as i always do) and noticed a star-like "object" that appeared to be on the move.  i did a double-take, as stars do not move, and realized that yes, this star was moving.  curious, i followed it with my eyes and watched as it turned left.  aware that this was no longer just some anomaly of the skies, and also aware that the "star" was going to pass over my townhome and out of sight, i ran inside to retrieve my camera and flew down the steps from my living room to my front door to confront the "star" again.  i began filming but was frustrated that i had to zoom in as much as i did just to get it into view.  long story short, there was no backdrop there to confirm it was even moving, so that's not good, and a car started to creep up on my left side... here in my community there is zero room to maneuver and park cars.  i had to move out of the way, and in doing so became frustrated and just turned the camera off.  i wish i hadn't.  for about 30 more seconds i just watched this "star" as it continued to glide into the distance... it was strange how, as i watched it, that i realized if i were someone who had just come outside, this "star" would not now appear as anything unusual... i could no longer see a flight path.  anyways, as i watched the "star" suddenly disappeared.  it just "blinked out".  one second it was there, floating across the sky, the second, it simply ceased to exist.  i am troubled by this.  did anyone else in the san diego area see it?
content.summary: Saw what looked like a star.  it was moving, not quickly, and changed direction and flew off into the distance where it just "turned off".  it was there in the distance, looking like a star that was flying away, and then it "blinked out".

content.detailedDescription:
I was just randomly photographing people walking by a side street, for 10 minutes.
i saw nothing visually but when i placed the camera card into my computer i noticed that a object appeared at 5:32 according to the camera, then nothing in the series till 5:35 the object appears to have reappeared and moved in a northern direction. the fact it wasn't in the series for three minutes 
means it wasn't just some a passing blimp slightly out of focus. 
i am a private pilot, so i know a little about flying vehicles. a blimp which do visit sb very often 
would have moved in three minutes way out of the picture.
content.summary: Accidentally photographed ufo
